My name is Jibo. <break size='0.5'/> <es cat = 'question'> What is your name? </es> <break size='2.0'/> It is so nice to meet you. <es name='affection_05' /> My favorite activity is to do my favorite dance! <es name='dance_disco_00' /> <es cat = 'question'> What activities do you like? </es>
